about_me: I am an aerospace engineer, pilot, and offshore sailor.  I am a maker who is passionate about discovery, fixing things, and solving problems, big and small.

An inventor at heart and an engineer by trade, I am always building something, like the massive rain barrel collection system for my house, my internet-connected espresso machine, or my hand-built cafe racer motorcycle.

From a young age I have been interested in aviation and spaceflight. I am a former Navy E-2D Advanced Hawkeye Pilot and commercial multi-engine rated pilot.  In college I designed, built, and launched a communications demonstration satellite with a team of undergrad students.

I am also a sailing coach, offshore racer, and USCG Licensed Master Captain. I have a personal commitment to sustainability and preserving the worldâ€™s oceans. I would like to continue to find ways to preserve and clean the world's waterways for future generations of mariners.
